title: Should I start the last 10 nights with Saudi Arabia and end with mine? (Laylatul Qadr) assimalhakeem
transcript: Shahid from India my question was like I was confused about the last 10 nights like you all in the Middle East you all begin Ramadan one day before us here in India so like should I start the 10 nights with you all and end with mine or should I start with mine no you should start with your country and do not be mindful whether is on Saturday or is it on Sunday like in Saudi Arabia or is it like in Friday in Japan or this is none of your concern for you in India you have to believe that Leila to other is one of the last 10 nights of Ramadan when I don't know I couldn't care less in the sense that I will do my level best in all of these 10 nights and inevitably and surely I will attain it with the grace of Allah and win the reward foreign [Music] have you ever taken a counseling session with me go to my website and you will find counseling sessions and apply for one if you can afford it that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled for one free session and this is for everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give them one free session without a problem a full half an hour so come to me and let's speak about it inshallah within the following two days or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's guidance to solve the problem once and for Allah
